text: Anɨb agel, bɨ anɨb ak adɨkɨd amɨl bɨawl ne anop agɨnɨgab, Bɨawl. Binɨb apan okok am agen, kɨli anɨb anɨb apal agɨnɨgab agak. Agek, bɨawl ak chɨbol nop ak tɨmel gek, bɨne anɨb anop man awl anɨb ak agyokɨl agɨnɨgab, Nad kasek kanɨbtam awl okok amɨl, kanɨbtam sɨkol okok amnoŋ agɨnɨgab agak. Binɨb yɨmgeptek okok dɨl, binɨb ñɨn tob pag pakek amdɨp okok dɨl, binɨb wɨdɨn koy gup okok dɨl, binɨb tob tɨmel gup okok dɨl, dad yɨp yɨl ownɨmɨn agɨnɨgab agak.
